name: Dragon City Mobile
summary:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!
Build your own Dragon City on the Floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in battle against other Dragon Masters in the PvP Arenas!
Breeding is essential in Dragon City: Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!
